1) Find a basis $D$ for $\mathbb{P}_{2}$ composed of eigenvectors of the linear transformation $T: \mathbb{P}_{2} \rightarrow \mathbb{P}_{2}$. Then find the matrix representation for $T$ relative to that basis, $M_{D, D}^{T}$

$$
T\left(a+b x+c x^{2}\right)=(a+b)+(b+c) x+(c+c) x^{2}
$$
